column4: I just disabled my touch pad and it re-enabled after tapping it a few times
? I've been msged? have not used xchat in some time. used to MIRC :)

part of the reason for loading linux onto this laptop is that the divorce is over finally and I dont have to worrie about loosing any inportant info for example (X=drugs and new criminal boy friend ) So now I'm trying to find a happy medium distro to load onto this system
Ive been using a p4 2ghz 1Gb ram for like 4 years and its really just getting to slow regardless.
this laptop I was given is a 3400+ turion x2 64 with 3gigs ram :)
